features: The Mandalorian: his body is shielded by beskar armor, his face is hidden behind a t-visor mask, and his past is wrapped in mystery

Disney plus series-inspired design: fans and collectors can imagine scenes from the Star Wars Galaxy with this premium The Mandalorian toy, inspired by the the Mandalorian live-action TV series on Disney plus
Tv series-based character-inspired accessories: This Star Wars the black series action figure comes with the mandalorian-inspired accessories that makes a great addition to any Star Wars collection

Premium articulation and detailing: Star Wars fans and collectors can display this highly poseable (4 Fully articulated limbs) figure, featuring premium deco, in their action figure and vehicle collection

Look for other figures from a galaxy far, far away: look for movie- and Entertainment-inspired Star Wars the black series figures to build a Star Wars Galaxy (each sold separately. Subject to availability)
body.description: The Mandalorian is battle-worn and tight-lipped, a formidable bounty hunter in an increasingly dangerous galaxy!kids and collectors alike can imagine the biggest battles and missions in the Star Wars saga with figures from Star Wars The black Series! With exquisite features and decoration, this series embodies the quality and realism that Star Wars devotees love. Star Wars the black Series includes figures, vehicles, and role-play items from the 40-plus-year legacy of the Star Wars Galaxy, including Comics, movies, and animated series. (Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.)may the force be with you!star Wars products are produced by Hasbro under license from Lucasfilm Ltd.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Star Wars The Black Series The Mandalorian Collectible Toy Action Figure The 6-inch scale Black Series figure is carefully detailed to look like the character from The Mandalorian live-action TV series, featuring premium detail and multiple points of articulation.

Product Features THE MANDALORIAN His body is shielded by beskar armor, his face is hidden behind a T-visored mask, and his past is wrapped in mystery DISNEY PLUS SERIES-INSPIRED DESIGN Fans and collectors can imagine scenes from the Star Wars Galaxy with this premium The Mandalorian toy, inspired by the The Mandalorian live-action TV series on Disney Plus TV SERIES-BASED CHARACTER-INSPIRED ACCESSORIES This Star Wars The Black Series action figure comes with The Mandalorian-inspired accessories that makes a great addition to any Star Wars collection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dang decent
reviews.reviewText: It's actually really cool. Bought it for my nephew, it's really well made, looks good, feels good, even kind of tastes good there I said it I'm not scared to admit it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This Black Series Mandalorian looks great with my Black series Baby Yoda, The Child, Grogu, whatever you want to call ‘em! He has nice paint on his long rifle and pistol. Which also continues onto his armor! He also is equipped with a soft plastic cape. It is better than some of the older fabric ones and plastic ones because it is controllable and soft. The articulation is good as well! In addition to that, his rifle can be stored on his back, and there is a big enough gap from the back to the cape so it can be stored over the cape. The pistol also has the ability to be stored in a holster. The strap that is meant to close the holster doesn’t work too great when the pistol is in it. One tip I can offer is inserting the pistol half way and then insert the strap peg into the trigger hole then continue to push the pistol in the rest of the way. Make sure the strap is pushed in with the gun. The packaging is the same old same old. Still looks cool though. I highly recommend this for any Star Wars/Mando fan! I bought mine from the seller “707 Street.” It was in excellent condition which is important to most collectors. 10/10 experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking, mint packaging
reviews.reviewText: Did not come damaged which is amazing. Looks great, great addition to the collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for collectors
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband. He collects these types of action figures and was happy to add it to his collection!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking figure, no missing pieces, box undamaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Glad i got it, slight box damage on the back but its lovely
reviews.reviewText: I really liked getting this, it's nice to support Jon Favreau products. I really do like the Black Series products too, reminds me of being a kid in the 90s and getting occasional gifts from my mom of a few action figures from the local Walmart back then or Target or elsewhere, we would travel together and was lots of fun. Once got the X wing with Luke Skywalker Pilot. really miss those days, things were happier then. and there was more hope in life, mostly through ignorance, but there's some hope still and I truly believe things will get better somehow.Right the product. Well, I was thinking about toys in general while looking at it, and thinking about what it means to get a product from a favorite TV show or movie. It's like a living piece of that movie right there with you in your room always. Probably the biggest part of the magic is it was sort of a gateway or key to reliving the magic world you saw in the theaters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son loved everything about this toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome fig, highly detailed
reviews.reviewText: I really wanna open it but damn.....excellent display case and they have not gone the marvel legends and Hasbro route with full cardboard
El vendedor y el producto se llevan la calificación más alta, muy bien empaquetado en buenas condiciones.Bonita figura del Mandaloriano Djin Darin..
The packaging was well put together and the box is perfect , really happy with the quality and it’s already put in more bubble wrap and a large rubber made container with all my other collectables

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad para amantes del Mandaloriano
reviews.reviewText: Consegui una oferta por esta figura y no lo dude. No me arrepiento, es muy buena calidad y poseable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: All I can say is fantastic worth the money my son loved it

Je l'avais vu en magasin (dans ma ville) et j'avais hésité à l'acheter (cette figurine m'avait tapé dans l’œil)... J'ai craqué sur Amazon quelques jours après et maintenant elle est sur mon étagère et elle claque bien ! Vraiment superbe et articulé de partout pour lui donne les poses que l'on veut. J'attends le baby Yoda maintenant (commande faite) :)
